item.description:
下午6点到晚上8点

 

We need a PERMANENT location, but for now, Mandarin speakers will need to register IN ADVANCE to get the location at HSPH and to get permission.

E-Mail LMA_Mandarin@YMail.com to register your intent AND sign YES on this meetup.

下午6点到晚上8点3

 

The request FROM YOU for admission on Tuesday evening NEEDS to be COMPLETED by 4 pm the day before the event.

Anonymity of the Meetup interface will NOT get you into the building.  This additional measure of transparency and COMPLIANCE is required for you to make your way TO the actual event.
item.how_to_find_us: Have you completed the diplomatic measures required for you to have building access the night of the event?

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Mandarin Conversation in Longwood Medical Area 下午6点到晚上8点
